entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySequence<byte> handling by System.Text.Json source generator #95187
  • [API Proposal]: Allow segmented raw writes for Utf8JsonWriter.WriteBase64StringValue #95186
  • [API Proposal]: Allow segmented raw writes for Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue #95185
  • Make typeof(T).GUID an intrinsic on NAOT where possible (like .NET Native) #95184
  • System.Text.Json, addition needed for JsonWriterOptions, to avoid URI serialization issue #95182
  • PublishAot brings in Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler and causes AppLocker issue #95174
  • VS default settings drops rejit requests without failing them #95172
  • Crash in DoStackSnapshot. #95167
  • [7.0] jit-dasm failed with error MSB3971 #95161
  • [8.0] [wasm] [AOT] HTTP Error 500.30 - ASP.NET Core app failed to start #95160
  • [8.0] [outerloop] jit-format: Format job found errors, please apply the format patch #95159
  • [6.0] An attempt was made to transition a task to a final state when it had already completed. #95158
  • [6.0] GSSAPI operation failed - Unspecified GSS failure - Crypto routine failure - Unexpected EOF trying to read request header #95156
  • [6.0] Error 12175 calling WINHTTP_CALLBACK_STATUS_REQUEST_ERROR, 'A security error occurred' #95155

Closed

  • [hot reload][mono] Drop apply_enclog_pass1 #90153
    9.0.0
  • [.NET8 + ARM64] Build no longer responds to SIGTERM and gets the Ubuntu service manager in trouble #94897
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics] MetricsSubscriptionManager.Dispose not called #94434
    9.0.0
  • AOT Crash on iOS Release build, net8p7 #90751
    8.0.0
  • Failed to debug coreCLR using a simple project #95168
  • Proposal: method-level variance #12677
    Future
  • Lack of ahead-of-time HttpConnectionPool warming leads to very long latencies on cold starts #93156
    Future
  • build clr subset failed on .net RC2 that failed generate native component #94902

PullRequests

Created

  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95183
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • [browser] js string marshaling by value #95180
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] JSImport binding improvements #95177
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update Array.cs #95173
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #95163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #95162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95157
    area-System.Security
  • Rename `library_exists_in_dir` to `file_exists_in_dir` and remove some unnecessary string allocations #95154
    area-Host
  • JIT: Assert bbJumpKind in BasicBlock::HasJump #95152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [hot_reload] Remove pass1 #95130
    area-EnC-mono
  • [workloads] Add the wasi-wasm cross compilers to the workload targets #95170
    area-Build-mono
  • Ensure MetricsSubscriptionManager disposing #95147
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up BasicBlock interface #95153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change to use std int for Interop tests #95040
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #95165
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #95166
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/6.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #95090
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Permit MD5 regardless of FIPS configuration for Linux #95089
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #95149
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #95148
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.1
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #95150
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update System.Diagnostics.Metrics and System.Diagnostics.Activities ownership #94785
    area-Meta
  • Arm64/SVE: Add insEncodeReg* methods #95105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Revert "Revert "Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version"" #95092
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading
  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Implement some of the NYI methods in unwindriscv64 #95128
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Arm64 encodings for 3A groups #95127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix build of host tests for s390x / ppc64 / armv6 #95145
    area-Host
  • JIT: Switch arm32 call-finally to be similar to other targets #95117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not Path.Join user directory if it's "C:" #94587
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static calls and handle nullable value types #94787
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] CI: Add AOT library tests job #95146
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Control flow refactor for `TryMoveNext` in `CompositeFormat` #94824
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Maintain a per-thread cache of pinning GC handles #95098
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix LSRA handling of arm32 double registers and spilling #94947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT LLVM, WASM] WebAssembly.instantiate(): unexpected section <Tag> #2437
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] [Question] this project will be added to main repo? #2435

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Mark all `JSExport` wrapper methods as `UnmanagedCallersOnly` #2436
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Fix typo in llvm version in docs #2438
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • task: DotNetCoreCLI@2 `dotnet restore` fails for .NET 7 with 8 SDK installed on Ubuntu with `CheckIfPackageReferenceShouldBeFrameworkReference` task could not be loaded #37124
  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 9 SDK installed, it should not be an unhandled exception when intalling tools that don't exist. #37123
  • Why does the dotnet new console need a network? #37121
  • `dotnet publish` fails on .NET SDK 8.0.100 #37118

Closed

  • dotnet list package --framework option not honoured #37120

PullRequests

Updated

  • Improve Container support for AOT publishing and targeting musl runtimes. #37054
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #36657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Why can't access a constructor element using 'this' #7714

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Practical existential types for interfaces #5556
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Overloading by `nint` and `IntPtr` in `op_Implicit` #70953
  • IDE0055 triggered over collection expressions (but not array initializers) #70951
  • IDE0030 Failing to build a C# class library project. Unhandled Exception: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null #70948
  • Can't emit source generated code files #70947

Closed

  • `await` completion in C# `void` method doesn't change `void` to `Task` when adding `async` #70866
  • Auto add async to method signature feature improvement #63081
    Backlog
  • IDE0028 False positive for new expressions as a class property #70952

PullRequests

Created

  • Decrease allocations in ObjectReaderTextReader.Create. #70950
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Emit constrained array access without runtime type check #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Set stack trace on logged assertion failure exceptions #70954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #70817
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate async methods #70941
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid binding when computing explicitly implemented member names and metadata names #70783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid binding when computing explicitly implemented member names #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement null conditional await #70916
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Angular, React and Vue templates are missing in Net 8 CLI #52340
  • Blazor WebApp Wasm Hot Reload does not work with UseRouting #52339
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52338
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plainTextSansFilter #52337
  • [blazor .net8] Will InteractiveAuto Component use Server mode when another Component in InteractiveServer mode? #52336
  • Health Checks, Dependency Injection, and Scope #52335
  • IHttpClientFactory.GetClient(string name) to access a mutated HttpClient instance #52334
  • Blazor Feature If Outside The Content #52333
  • net8 packages (e.g. Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly 8.0.0) target netstandard2.0 (and other various frameworks), but according to Microsoft they can only be used on net8 #52332
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect version 7+ does not read at least couple of properties (Issuers, IssuerSigningKeys JwksUri) #52330
  • Blazor .NET 8 with Authorize attribute, "No Authentication Scheme" when running in Azure App Services #52326
  • Angular 17 - SpaServices.Extensions - Wrong regex #52325
  • ConnectionAbortedException ---> Reading is already in progress #52324
  • Blazor Stream Rendering not working on IIS Express #52323
  • Reading multipart/form-data request stream => file upload issues #52321
  • Static files can't be served from the root when a Razor page component matches that route with param #52320
  • ASP.NET Core WebAPI includes InvariantGlobalization setting in .csproj in .NET 8 but is not stated as a change. #52319
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef #52318

Closed

  • App does not take settings from appsettings.Development.json in Debug/Development #52306
  • .NET 8 Upgrade Causes Post-Logout Loop in Blazor Server App with Azure AD B2C #52245
  • Aftet dotnet 8 upgrade ws-federation with ADFS broken #52304
  • [.NET 8] Using attribute [Authorize] is bugged when refreshing page (shows HTTP ERROR 401 despite being logged in) #52317
  • warning ASP0023: Route '[action]/{session}' conflicts with another action route. An HTTP request that matches multiple routes results in an ambiguous #52278
  • Dynamic ports via code in runtime. #52244
  • [Blazor] UI navigation based on (tree)router nodes #52287
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #52263
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #52312
  • HttpContext could not be found #52029
  • NavigateTo doesn't work in Blazor 8 RC2 when enhanced navigation is disabled #51636
    8.0.1
  • The 499 status code may be returned when using Request timeouts and Exception Handler together #52295

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Try to load the assembly when finding out a root component or a parameter in webassembly #52331
    area-blazor
  • #52325 - Add configurable SpaBuilder regex #52327
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix radio button reset after submitting enhanced form #52219
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1
  • Support NavigateTo when enhanced nav is disabled #52267
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.1

Updated

  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update MSBuild targets so they get imported correctly (main) #52301
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Override IOQueueCount via env vars #51964
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52103
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix type name hashing when the type has multibyte characters #52316
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support archiving and rotating for Сreatedump tool #4412

Closed

  • dotnet dump analyze's `gcroot <address>` crashes on arm64 #4388
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TapGestureRecognizer disregards parent's IsEnabled status on iOS and Catalyst. #18995
  • FlyoutItem and MenuItem styles don't work #18994
  • .NET MAUI Blazor NavigationManager.Refresh() causes a flicker of a white page #18993
  • Add Support for KeyedServices #18992
  • [testing] The test ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly sometimes fails on iOS #18991
  • [testing] xharness can't boot and install app on 14.5 simulators with macOS Sonoma #18989
  • RefreshView indicator is behind Content Page Title #18987
  • [tests] Fail on EnsureCellSizesAreCached DeviceTest iOS 15.4 and 14.5 #18985 #18986
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [tests] Regression on WebView HandlerLeak DeviceTest iOS 15.4 and 14.5 #18985
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Page Layout is not applied correctly #18984
  • [iOS] Image layout issue in MAUI 8 (regression, worked correct in MAUI 7) #18983
  • Modal navigation not working when the window is not active #18982
  • [Testing] App.EnterText not working with iOS password #18981
    Backlog
  • Order of priority between Styles.xaml and custom css has changed in .net 8 #18980
  • Accesibility issue with Label selection in Windows and Android #18978
  • IsEnabled not working properly for layout #18977
  • DataTrigger do not restore the original value anymore (Regression, broken in MAUI 8) #18976
  • ScrollView with Fill vertical option is bigger than the page when ScrollView is a root on iOS #18975
  • Shell and TabbedPage #18974
  • Issue with android application context in .net 8 #18973

Closed

  • Android: FileNotFoundException only in Release-Mode when using System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo(...) #17932
  • [iOS] Scrollviewer not scrolling #11558
    Backlog
  • Using Nightly builds (8.0.0-nightly) breaks packages that require >= 8.0.3 #18931
    Backlog
  • Safe area layout guide not working in MAUI .NET8 on iOS 17.1.1 #18969
  • NullReferenceException on MemoryMarshal.TryGetArray (iOS only) #18761
  • Hot Reload Performance #13051
  • Add support for WiX Toolset Harvest Tool (Heat) HarvestProject element #16096

PullRequests

Created

  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of MaximumTrackColor on Slider when using Mac Idiom #18990
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Revert "Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache" #18988
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8.0.4 for nightlies #18963

Updated

  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Add Layout UITests #18923
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.7.0 to 4.8.0 #18944
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [tests] Add runs on iOS17 #18962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18943
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18942
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18941
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPC with tables that don't have a common PK? #32401
  • EF8 SQL: "Incorrect syntax near the keyword 'WITH'." when joining tables with list.Contains in Where #32400

Closed

  • [EFCORE8] ICollection Contains id translate error in sqlserver #32399
  • LazyLoader retains references to the EF model after it has been detatched/disposed #32348
    9.0.0
  • JsonValueReaderWriter.FromJsonString doesn't seem to correctly parse #32269
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #27844 - EF Core 6.0 temporal table migration when altering computed column not generating correct script #32398

Merged

  • Correctly parse JSON from string #32393
  • Stop keeping a reference to the model in LazyLoader instances and the Castle interceptor #32388

Updated

  • Handle shadow navigations when loading with split queries #32396

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Please provide patch-agnostic URLs for runtime downloads #11040
  • `dotnet restore` never completes #17481
